column4: Have some one tried gear dvd-burner application?  I need an application that can burn dvd videos easely in a GUI,  cant seem to find one :(
what has googled turned up in the way of guis?
i found out that k3b --videodvd   can help me burn videodvd's :)
ah cool....since your doing dvd videos, have you heard of a product called DVD shrink....a friend of mine was asking about a linux alternative the other day
